name: Save Your Damsel Self
description:
This game was made for the Pixel Weekend Jam #3 by the community over at 72 Pin Connector. The game is 100% free, if you'd really like to make a donation, throw some money at Child's Play, they rock.

The game code is open source (MIT License) and the assets are CC-BY. Please use anything you can for any reason, just link to https://www.72pinconnector.com/ somewhere in a comment or in the credits somewhere. To get it, grab the P8 file right here or download the Pico 8 cartridge below.
